description:
Eren, as the Founding Titan, advances on Fort Salta with countless other Titans. Appearing before the refugees, who stand on the brink of despair, are Mikasa, Armin, Jean, Conny, Reiner, Pieck, and Levi, who narrowly escaped from the rumbling. The battle between former comrades and childhood friends with Eren concludes here.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Kampf zwischen Himmel und Erde / Ein langer Traum / Hin zum Baum auf dem Hügel
Entre ciel et terre / Un long rêve / L`arbre sur la colline
Ten to Chi no Tatakai / Nagai Yume / Ano Oka no Ki ni Mukatte
The Battle of Heaven and Earth / A Long Dream / Toward the Tree on That Hill
天と地の戦い / 長い夢 / あの丘の木に向かって
